page.title: 09From Salt Pie to the Bailey
page.content: The primary land cover is{farmland,} enclosed rough{grazing.}The secondary land cover is{housing.} All the people have cars, as there is no public transport.Most people have telephones, because there are no public phoneboxes.The nearest amenities are in Thornton village.The only leisure facility is a riding stable.The people have to organise their own leisure or go into Thornton. As the primary land cover is farmland there are a lot of farmhouses. However houses are slowly being built.7 out of 10 people find life boring in this square.The others like living in this area.{ { { {
